description: First in a series of 5 geography programmes which travel the length of the River Severn for 9-11 year olds. This programme looks at the physical geography of the river from source to mouth and the natural state of it including sources.

subject: GEOGRAPHY
title: LANDMARKS :THE RIVER SEVERN:THE COURSE OF THE RIVER

description: Ioan Wyn Evans reports on the economic and environmental effects of the Sea Empress oil disaster in Pembrokeshire  and compares it with the Braer disaster a few years before.
keywords: Environmental issues, Sea Empress, Tourism, Fishing, Economic activity, Pollution
subject: GEOGRAPHY
title: TARO NAW : 4:OIL SPILL
